name: Shot Up!
description:
Grumpy Granny lost her shit when she heard a loud Metal concert in the area. She felt like it's time to show those devils what real music sounds like... for the last time in their lives! Bloody Mary annihilates the crowd with Fire On The Dancefloor Cat and Terror Shoot Gun, and it's our very unexpected mission to evacuate the crowd. Use the Event Security Guards to redirect metalheads away from the main entrance (a.k.a. Granny's Gate) and through emergency exits to keep fatalities low.

A Sensei Game Jam 2017 game by Patryk 'PsichiX' Budzyński, Iwo 'Outfrost' Bujkiewicz, Przemek Dmytruszyński, Asia Leśniak & Pavel Nikalayeu
